SELECT RNUM, STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_PROCESS, TO_CHAR(STUDY_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS STUDY_START_DATE, STUDY_DATE, STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, STUDY_MAJOR, STUDY_ADDRESS, STUDY_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER, STUDY_REGISTER_DATE, STUDY_UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, LIKE_NUMBER -- TBL_LIKE에서 추가한 컬럼 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, S.STUDY_NUMBER, S.STUDY_TITLE, S.STUDY_PROCESS, S.STUDY_START_DATE, S.STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_STUDENT_COUNT, S.STUDY_MAJOR, S.STUDY_ADDRESS, S.STUDY_CONTENT, S.USER_NUMBER, S.STUDY_REGISTER_DATE, S.STUDY_UPDATE_DATE, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NICKNAME, L.LIKE_NUMBER -- TBL_LIKE 테이블 조인 FROM TBL_STUDY_BOARD S JOIN TBL_USERS U ON S.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_LIKE L ON S.STUDY_NUMBER = L.STUDY_NUMBER WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount} and user_number=#{userNumber} and LIKE_NUMBER is not null
